monsters.name: Iron Legion Soldier
monsters.description: A disciplined soldier in iron armor, trained in formation combat.

attacks.name: Iron Gladius
attacks.description: A short iron sword strikes with brutal efficiency!

attacks.name: Pilum Throw
attacks.description: A heavy iron javelin pierces armor!

specialAbilities.name: Shield Wall
specialAbilities.description: When fighting alongside allies, AC increases by 2.

specialAbilities.name: Disciplined
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on saves against being frightened.

flavorText: A soldier in iron plate advances in perfect formation!
The legion marches - discipline and iron combined!
Shield raised, sword ready - a trained warrior attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The soldier falls, maintaining discipline even in defeat.

monsters.name: Iron Golem
monsters.description: A massive construct of pure iron, nearly indestructible.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.description: An iron fist crashes down like a falling anvil!

specialAbilities.name: Immutable Form
specialAbilities.description: Immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

specialAbilities.name: Magic Resistance
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on saves against spells and magical effects.

specialAbilities.name: Poison Breath
specialAbilities.description: Recharge 5-6: Exhales poisonous gas in 15-foot cone. DC 19 CON save or take 10d8 poison damage (half on success).

flavorText: The ground shakes - a golem of pure iron awakens!
Unstoppable and unfeeling - an iron colossus attacks!
Metal screams against metal as the iron golem moves!
monsters.defeatedText: The iron golem crashes to the ground, its magic finally exhausted.

monsters.name: Gladiator Champion
monsters.description: An arena champion, master of multiple weapons and combat styles.

attacks.name: Net
attacks.description: Heavy weighted net entangles! (DC 15 STR save or restrained)

specialAbilities.name: Crowd Favorite
specialAbilities.description: When reduces enemy to 0 HP, gains 15 temporary HP.

specialAbilities.name: Parry
specialAbilities.description: Can use reaction to add +3 AC against one melee attack.

flavorText: The crowd roars! A gladiator champion enters the arena!
Scarred and deadly - a master of the arena faces you!
This warrior has killed hundreds - will you be next?
monsters.defeatedText: The champion falls, the crowd's cheers fading to silence.

monsters.name: War Elephant
monsters.description: A massive elephant clad in iron armor, trained for battle.

attacks.name: Gore
attacks.description: Iron-tipped tusks gore with devastating force!

specialAbilities.name: Trampling Charge
specialAbilities.description: If moves 20+ feet toward creature and hits with gore, target must succeed DC 18 STR save or be knocked prone. Can make stomp as bonus action against prone creatures.

specialAbilities.name: Iron Barding
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical piercing and slashing damage.

flavorText: The earth trembles beneath iron-shod feet!
A trumpeting roar - a war elephant charges!
Armored and unstoppable - the war beast attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The mighty war elephant crashes to the ground, its trumpeting silenced.

monsters.name: Iron Legion Centurion
monsters.description: An elite officer leading iron-clad troops, master tactician and warrior.

attacks.name: Iron Spatha
attacks.description: A masterwork long sword cuts through defenses!

specialAbilities.name: Tactical Genius
specialAbilities.description: All allies within 30 feet gain +2 to attack rolls.

specialAbilities.name: Rallying Cry
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, all allies within 60 feet gain 20 temporary HP.

flavorText: A centurion steps forward, battle-hardened and deadly!
The legion's finest officer commands the battlefield!
Years of warfare shine in the centurion's eyes!
monsters.defeatedText: The centurion falls, giving orders to the last breath.

monsters.name: Minotaur
monsters.description: A bull-headed warrior wielding a massive iron axe, rage incarnate.

attacks.name: Iron Greataxe
attacks.description: A massive axe swings with terrible fury!

specialAbilities.name: Charge
specialAbilities.description: If moves 10+ feet straight toward target and hits with gore, deals extra 2d8 damage and target must succeed DC 16 STR save or be pushed 10 feet and knocked prone.

specialAbilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
specialAbilities.description: Can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

specialAbilities.name: Reckless
specialAbilities.description: At start of turn, can gain advantage on melee attacks but attacks against it have advantage.

flavorText: A bestial roar! A minotaur charges from the shadows!
Half-man, half-bull, all rage - the minotaur attacks!
Massive and unstoppable, the maze-dweller has found you!
monsters.defeatedText: The minotaur's roar fades as it collapses, finally at peace.
